metadata.title: CVE-2015-8034 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
The state.sls function in Salt before 2015.8.3 uses weak permissions on thecache data, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information byreading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8034` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-cloud - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-common - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-master - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-minion - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-proxy - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-ssh - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-syndic - 2015.8.8+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.8+ds-1').
